nodes.name: Łukasz Rej
nodes.profile: I've been learning front-end for over two years as a hobby. First practical experience as a Junior Frontend Developer is behind me. Almost 5 months at Miinto gave me confidence. The company decided to terminate contract with me and others (cornovirus). Now I am looking for new opportunities.

education.field: Field of study: JavaScript Developer: React
education.scope: Thematic scope: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SASS, RWD, jQuery, ECMAScript 6, Git, React JS
